name: Lisa Bonet
description:
Did you know that Lisa Bonet...

Yes, we know! She is Jewish!

Don't interrupt, please. Did you know...

Yes, she married Lenny Kravitz! They both had a Jewish and a black parent, so they bonded over that. It didn't last, however...

Will you let us finish! Did you know that Lisa Bonet...

Get on with it!

Did you know that Lisa Bonet changed her name to Lilakoi Moon?

No!

Well, she did!

How is that relevant to this website?
